description: Large-scale text-to-video model with 13 billion parameters for high-quality video generation

prompt.description: The text prompt to guide video generation
prompt.placeholder: A majestic eagle soaring through mountain valleys...

duration.description: Duration of the generated video in seconds

aspect_ratio.description: Aspect ratio of the generated video

guidance_scale.description: How closely the model should follow the prompt

prompt_details.style_guide: Create detailed, cinematic descriptions with focus on movement, lighting, and visual storytelling
best_practices: Use specific, vivid descriptions of scenes and actions
Include camera movements and cinematic techniques
Describe lighting conditions and atmospheric effects
Mention specific details about characters and environments
Use action-oriented language for dynamic scenes

example_prompts.title: Wildlife Documentary
example_prompts.prompt: A majestic eagle soaring through mountain valleys, wings spread wide against dramatic cloudy skies, camera following its graceful flight path as it navigates between rocky peaks

example_prompts.title: Urban Action
example_prompts.prompt: A parkour athlete leaping between rooftops in a modern city, fluid movements captured in slow motion, golden hour lighting creating dramatic shadows across urban architecture

example_requests.title: Nature Scene
example_requests.description: Peaceful nature video with gentle movement

request.prompt: Sunlight filtering through forest canopy, leaves gently swaying in the breeze, dappled light dancing on the forest floor

example_requests.title: High-Quality Cinematic
example_requests.description: Professional quality video with detailed scene

request.prompt: A vintage train moving through countryside at sunset, steam billowing from the engine, warm golden light illuminating rolling hills and distant mountains

url.description: URL where the video can be downloaded

content_type.description: MIME type of the video file

file_size.description: Size of the video file in bytes

usage_tips: 13B parameter model provides high-quality, detailed videos
Higher guidance scale values make the model follow prompts more closely
Longer durations allow for more complex scene development
1080p resolution available for premium quality output
Use detailed prompts to leverage the model's capabilities
limitations: Larger model requires more processing time
Higher resolutions and longer durations increase cost
Complex scenes may require careful prompt engineering
Best results with well-structured, detailed prompts

pricing.estimated_cost: Premium pricing for high-quality 13B parameter model
